text:
INSTITUTE OF COMMUNICATIONS RESEARCH
THE UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS + URBANA
May 20, 1961*
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Vice President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
131*6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D.C.
Dear Harold:
It was good to see you at Cherry Hill.
Charles Lee sent me your letter of May 5 and the institutional affiliation
form. The only category for which The Annenberg School would be eligible
at the present time is Educational Associate. However, there is no such
category on the form, nor ary information about the cost and advantages of
such membership. Could you enlighten me?
Sincerely yours.
George Gerbner
GG:ls
